\begin{widetext} \begin{equation} (L\; \delta_A q)_i(t)\equiv -\int dt' \; \frac{\delta^2 S}{\delta q^i(t)
\delta q^j(t')} \; \delta_A q^j(t')
%+ \gamma_{ij}(t) \delta_A \dot q ^j(t)
+\int_{-\infty}^t dt'\, \mu_{ij}(t-t')\; \delta_A \dot q ^j
(t')=\epsilon \frac{\delta A}{\delta q^i(t)}\;, \label{dist}\end{equation}
\
